phases.name: Fix Field Names
phases.description: Update API call field names to match backend expectations

subtasks.description: Update project creation API call to use correct field names (address, estimated_end_date)

verification.run: Create a new project via UI and verify address and estimated_end_date are saved correctly

subtasks.notes: Fixed API field name mismatch - changed 'location' to 'address' and 'expectedEndDate' to 'estimated_end_date' in projectsApi.create() call in ProjectsPage.tsx. Changes committed successfully.
